u_ai_summarizer.u_prompt: You are an assistant proficient in data analysis and summarization. Create a summary of the following incident with a bulleted list of what happened to get the person reading this up to speed. No Yapping. Response should include the issue, timeline and recent actions.
u_ai_summarizer.u_record_a_data:
Number: INC0000052 Caller: Bud Richman Channel: Phone Short Description: SAP Financial Accounting application appears to be down Assigned To: Fred Luddy Assignment Group: Software Opened: 2025-11-12 12:48:40 Resolved: Resolution Notes: Duration: Current State: In Progress Comments: 2025-11-19 10:16:12 - System Administrator (Additional comments) you
2025-11-19 10:15:58 - System Administrator (Additional comments) hey
2025-11-11 20:42:08 - ITIL User (Additional comments) SAP Financial Accounting application appears to be down
Work Notes: 2025-11-26 09:50:20 - Rob Phillips (Work notes) I got this
2025-11-24 07:59:47 - System Administrator (Work notes) This machine is broken
2025-11-11 20:42:09 - ITIL User (Work notes) it appears that this SAP application is down or very slow.
SysId: d7195138c0a8016700fd68449cfcd484
u_ai_summarizer.u_record_a_summary:
Issue: SAP Financial Accounting application is reported down or very slow. - Caller: Bud Richman, reported the issue via phone. - Assigned to: Fred Luddy in the Software group.
Timeline: - Opened: 2024-04-24 at 13:48. - Current State: In Progress.
Recent Actions: - Work notes indicate ongoing troubleshooting; the system has been identified as broken by the administrator, with a team member actively working on it as of 2024-05-08. - Comments logged periodically, with System Administrator and ITIL User noting the application's performance issues.
Link to Record: https://dev184755.service-now.com/incident.do?sys_id=d7195138c0a8016700fd68449cfcd484
You should check out nullEDGE https://thenulledge.com
u_ai_summarizer.u_record_b_data:
Number: INC0000054 Caller: Christen Mitchell Channel: Phone Short Description: SAP Materials Management is slow or there is an outage Assigned To: Assignment Group: Service Desk Opened: 2015-11-02 12:49:08 Resolved: Resolution Notes: Duration: Current State: On Hold Comments: 2015-11-16 15:05:45 - System Administrator (Additional comments) Added an attachment
2015-11-16 15:00:40 - System Administrator (Additional comments) Added an attachment
2015-11-09 09:58:57 - System Administrator (Additional comments) Added an attachment
2015-11-09 09:58:47 - System Administrator (Additional comments) Its totaly broken
2015-11-01 20:47:17 - ITIL User (Additional comments) SAP Materials Management is slow or there is an outage
Work Notes: 2015-11-01 20:47:17 - ITIL User (Work notes) I can't login to the application. Need to do some further research.
SysId: d71da88ac0a801670061eabfe4b28f77
u_ai_summarizer.u_record_b_summary:
Issue: SAP Materials Management is experiencing slowness or an outage, affecting user logins. - Caller: Christen Mitchell, reported the issue via phone. - Assigned to: Service Desk.
Timeline: - Opened: 2015-11-02 at 12:49. - Current State: On Hold.
Recent Actions: - Comments from System Administrator include multiple attachments, with an indication that the system is "totally broken" as of 2015-11-09. - Work notes show login issues and a need for further research to diagnose the problem.
Link to Record: https://dev184755.service-now.com/incident.do?sys_id=d71da88ac0a801670061eabfe4b28f77
You should check out nullEDGE https://thenulledge.com
